page.title: 18FAVOURITE PASTIME, EXMOUTH
page.content: My favourite pastime is riding my bicycle. It is a Raleigh Racer with a ten speed gear and 22 inch wheels. It is painted bright blue and looks really new. I ride it around Elm Road, Phear Avenue and Turner's Avenue nearly every day. I learnt to ride a two wheeler bike when I was five. I passed my cycling proficiency test at the Community College last year when I was ten. I can now ride my bike on busy roads safely. The busiest roads are Exeter Road, Salterton Road and Rolle Street. On Thursday 20th June I counted 19 cars, 3 buses, 2 lorries, 14 vans, 9 motorbikes and 8 bicycles during a five minute period on Exeter Road.
